thread.title: Raul Roman Jr
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Raul Roman Jr

author: Raul Roman Jr
title: Raul Roman Jr
text: I use to shop from Cohens for designer eyewear but thought I'd give this a try. I'm definitely glad I did. Not only did I get an amazing price on my Dita Mach ones (more than $200 off reg price) but they came within a few days in perfect condition with all the authentic packaging and the authenticity certificate from DITA which I never got from Cohens when I've ordered Ditas before. I will definitely shop here again and recommend to anyone looking for eyewear.
